verses.verse: The burden <WH4853> of Egypt <WH4714>. Behold, the YY <WH3068> rideth <WH7392> <WH8802> upon a swift <WH7031> cloud <WH5645>, and shall come <WH935> <WH8804> into Egypt <WH4714>: and the idols <WH457> of Egypt <WH4714> shall be moved <WH5128> <WH8804> at his presence <WH6440>, and the heart <WH3824> of Egypt <WH4714> shall melt <WH4549> <WH8735> in the midst <WH7130> of it.

And I will set <WH5526> <WH8773> the Egyptians <WH4714> against the Egyptians <WH4714>: and they shall fight <WH3898> <WH8738> every one <WH376> against his brother <WH251>, and every one <WH376> against his neighbour <WH7453>; city <WH5892> against city <WH5892>, and kingdom <WH4467> against kingdom <WH4467>.

And the spirit <WH7307> of Egypt <WH4714> shall fail <WH1238> <WH8738> in the midst <WH7130> thereof; and I will destroy <WH1104> <WH8762> the counsel <WH6098> thereof: and they shall seek <WH1875> <WH8804> to the idols <WH457>, and to the charmers <WH328>, and to them that have familiar spirits <WH178>, and to the wizards <WH3049>.

And <WH853> the Egyptians <WH4714> will I give over <WH5534> <WH8765> into the hand <WH3027> of a cruel <WH7186> lord <WH113>; and a fierce <WH5794> king <WH4428> shall rule <WH4910> <WH8799> over them, saith <WH5002> <WH8803> the YY <WH113>, the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>.
And the waters <WH4325> shall fail <WH5405> <WH8738> from the sea <WH3220>, and the river <WH5104> shall be wasted <WH2717> <WH8799> and dried up <WH3001> <WH8804>.

And they shall turn <WH2186> the rivers <WH5104> far away <WH2186> <WH8689>; and the brooks <WH2975> of defence <WH4693> shall be emptied <WH1809> <WH8804> and dried up <WH2717> <WH8804>: the reeds <WH7070> and flags <WH5488> shall wither <WH7060> <WH8804>.

The paper reeds <WH6169> by the brooks <WH2975>, by the mouth <WH6310> of the brooks <WH2975>, and every thing sown <WH4218> by the brooks <WH2975>, shall wither <WH3001> <WH8799>, be driven away <WH5086> <WH8738>, and be no more.

The fishers <WH1771> also shall mourn <WH578> <WH8804>, and all they that cast <WH7993> <WH8688> angle <WH2443> into the brooks <WH2975> shall lament <WH56> <WH8804>, and they that spread <WH6566> <WH8802> nets <WH4365> upon <WH6440> the waters <WH4325> shall languish <WH535> <WH8797>.
Moreover they that work <WH5647> <WH8802> in fine <WH8305> flax <WH6593>, and they that weave <WH707> <WH8802> networks <WH2355>, shall be confounded <WH954> <WH8804>.
And they shall be broken <WH1792> <WH8794> in the purposes <WH8356> thereof, all that make <WH6213> <WH8802> sluices <WH7938> and ponds <WH99> for fish <WH5315>.

Surely the princes <WH8269> of Zoan <WH6814> are fools <WH191>, the counsel <WH6098> of the wise <WH2450> counsellors <WH3289> <WH8802> of Pharaoh <WH6547> is become brutish <WH1197> <WH8737>: how say <WH559> <WH8799> ye unto Pharaoh <WH6547>, I am the son <WH1121> of the wise <WH2450>, the son <WH1121> of ancient <WH6924> kings <WH4428> ?

Where <WH335> are they? where <WH645> are thy wise <WH2450> men? and let them tell <WH5046> <WH8686> thee now, and let them know <WH3045> <WH8799> what the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> hath purposed <WH3289> <WH8804> upon Egypt <WH4714>.

The princes <WH8269> of Zoan <WH6814> are become fools <WH2973> <WH8738>, the princes <WH8269> of Noph <WH5297> are deceived <WH5377> <WH8738>; they have also seduced <WH8582> <WH8689> Egypt <WH4714>, even they that are the stay <WH6438> of the tribes <WH7626> thereof.

The YY <WH3068> hath mingled <WH4537> <WH8804> a perverse <WH5773> spirit <WH7307> in the midst <WH7130> thereof: and they have caused Egypt <WH4714> to err <WH8582> <WH8689> in every work <WH4639> thereof, as a drunken <WH7910> man staggereth <WH8582> <WH8736> in his vomit <WH6892>.
Neither shall there be any work <WH4639> for Egypt <WH4714>, which the head <WH7218> or tail <WH2180>, branch <WH3712> or rush <WH100>, may do <WH6213> <WH8799>.

In that day <WH3117> shall Egypt <WH4714> be like unto women <WH802>: and it shall be afraid <WH2729> <WH8804> and fear <WH6342> <WH8804> because <WH6440> of the shaking <WH8573> of the hand <WH3027> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, which he shaketh <WH5130> <WH8688> over it.

And the land <WH127> of Y'hudah <WH3063> shall be a terror <WH2283> unto Egypt <WH4714>, every one that maketh mention <WH2142> <WH8686> thereof shall be afraid <WH6342> <WH8799> in himself, because <WH6440> of the counsel <WH6098> of the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>, which he hath determined <WH3289> <WH8802> against it.

In that day <WH3117> shall five <WH2568> cities <WH5892> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> speak <WH1696> <WH8764> the language <WH8193> of Kanahan <WH3667>, and swear <WH7650> <WH8737> to the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635>; one <WH259> shall be called <WH559> <WH8735>, The city <WH5892> of destruction <WH2041>.

In that day <WH3117> shall there be an altar <WH4196> to the YY <WH3068> in the midst <WH8432> of the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>, and a pillar <WH4676> at <WH681> the border <WH1366> thereof to the YY <WH3068>.

And it shall be for a sign <WH226> and for a witness <WH5707> unto the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> in the land <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714>: for they shall cry <WH6817> <WH8799> unto the YY <WH3068> because <WH6440> of the oppressors <WH3905> <WH8801>, and he shall send <WH7971> <WH8799> them a saviour <WH3467> <WH8688>, and a great one <WH7227>, and he shall deliver <WH5337> <WH8689> them.

And the YY <WH3068> shall be known <WH3045> <WH8738> to Egypt <WH4714>, and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall know <WH3045> <WH8804> the YY <WH3068> in that day <WH3117>, and shall do <WH5647> <WH8804> sacrifice <WH2077> and oblation <WH4503>; yea, they shall vow <WH5087> <WH8804> a vow <WH5088> unto the YY <WH3068>, and perform <WH7999> <WH8765> it.

And the YY <WH3068> shall smite <WH5062> <WH8804> Egypt <WH4714>: he shall smite <WH5062> <WH8800> and heal <WH7495> <WH8800> it: and they shall return <WH7725> <WH8804> even to the YY <WH3068>, and he shall be intreated <WH6279> <WH8738> of them, and shall heal <WH7495> <WH8804> them.

In that day <WH3117> shall there be a highway <WH4546> out of Egypt <WH4714> to Ashur <WH804>, and the Ashurn <WH804> shall come <WH935> <WH8804> into Egypt <WH4714>, and the Egyptian <WH4714> into Ashur <WH804>, and the Egyptians <WH4714> shall serve <WH5647> <WH8804> with the Ashurns <WH804>.
In that day <WH3117> shall Yisra'EL <WH3478> be the third <WH7992> with Egypt <WH4714> and with Ashur <WH804>, even a b'rakhah <WH1293> in the midst <WH7130> of the land <WH776>:

Whom the YY <WH3068> TZva'ot <WH6635> shall bless <WH1288> <WH8765>, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, Blessed <WH1288> <WH8803> be Egypt <WH4714> my people <WH5971>, and Ashur <WH804> the work <WH4639> of my hands <WH3027>, and Yisra'EL <WH3478> mine inheritance <WH5159>.
